name: FeatureCardOne
description: Adaptive feature section with image/video-based cards in customizable bento grid layouts or carousel.

description.example: Discover the tools and capabilities that make our platform powerful
Get detailed insights into your business performance

propsSchema.features: Array<{ title: string, description: string, button?: {text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string} } & ({ imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string } | { videoSrc: string, videoAriaLabel?: string })>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' | 'depth-3d' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <FeatureCardOne features={[{ title: 'Analytics', description: 'Get insights', imageSrc: '/feature.jpg', button: { text: 'Learn More', href: '#' } }]} title="Our Features" description="Discover what makes us different" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
